items.summary: I went on a walk yesterday. I walked five miles. It was with all my friends, Isla, Chris and Connel. ðŸ¤¡
items.content_html:
I went on a walk yesterday.

I walked five miles.

It was with all my friends, Isla, Chris and Connel.
